- file not required
- - use unique plugin identifiers - all configuration via environment variables to support ease of deployment in containers - use C collation to be equivalent to SQLite - migrations updated for Postgres SQL dialect - database optimisation and shutdown cleanup tasks - pgsql database backup support - Docker container support with Dockerfile and example docker-compose.yaml - packaging script to ease copying plugin to container host - use current component versions based on 10.11-rc3 and target 10.11 ABI
- Add initial migration and Provider
- Add JF as submodule
- Add code container and setup dependencies
- Initial commit
